author: Eliane Veillet
comment: Excellent app . Never crash,  ability to add your own cards and photo of them manually, plus super easy to add loyalty cards of almost any stores .

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Eliane, thank you very much for your loyalty! Hope FidMe makes your shopping easier

author: Pieter Biesemans
comment: Have so much more space in my wallet after installing this app and transferring all my card to it. Most shops can scan my phone no problem, sometimes the cashier just types in the code, but  it always works.

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Pieter, thank you for your loyalty! Send us barcodes pictures of your cards, we'll check if the parameters are well registered on FidMe

author: Sandra J.
comment: Good App., makes place in my wallet, sure to get my fidelity points, card scan easy, wouldn't like to miss it😉!

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Sandra, thank you very much for your loyalty! Hope your shopping is getting better and easier :)

author: Frederic Wolters
comment: Perfect app if you want to have all loyalty cards at hand at all times with no extra big wallet.

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Frederic, thank you very muchf or your loyalty! Enjoy FidMe

author: Deondra Davis
comment: Did not except at the grocery store...delete!

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your feedback. Can you please tell us at support@fidme.com which grocery you tried ? The card can't be read by the scanner or the shop didn't want to use FidMe app ?

author: Peter Conium
comment: I really want this to work! My wallet has much more room now but I have yet to find a shop where the stored card is read. I'll have to put the cards back in my wallet. I'm using a Moto Z. Update January 9 2018. At last I found a store where the scanner works. Waitrose!!!  Still no joy at Tesco, Morrisons or Sainsbury.

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Peter, thank you very much for your feedback. there are still retailers that are not equipped with the latest technology for the mobile scanner. This may work or not work in the same store to another. It is not a problem with your mobile or the app. If you see "hand scanner", try first, it usually goes much better.

author: Roshan Aman
comment: There is a 5-7 second lag when you open the app on gear S3 before any cards can be selected. Even after you select and you go back to main page to select another the lag reappears. Please fix that as I mainly use the function through my watch.

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Roshan, thank you for your feedback. Have you create your widgets and then synchronise with your watch ? Let us know at support@fidme.com

author: Luciane Fortes
comment: A real game changer! It's so practical to scan the barcodes from my phone instead of having innumerous cards on my wallet. Never again forgetting the library card or missing a discount!

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello Luciane, thank you very much for your loyalty! We're glad that FidMe changed your shopping lifestyle :)

author: Whooty McWhooface
comment: Nice presentation but it has it's quirks.  If you have a card not listed (like a public library card) it has a feature to create your own card, but when the new bar code is used it throws in extra numbers before the library card number.  You can't use a logo you got from their website for graphics, you can only access your camera to take a picture of the logo.  Hokey.  The nearby stores feature is useless to me, apparently that only works in France (I think).

reply.author: Snapp'
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your feedback. Send us front and back pictures of your loyalty card at support@fidme.com, we'll create it and add it on FidMe!
